name: Astro Knots
description:
This project was developed over the course of a month as a part of the Indie Game Academy Level 2 program. 

Inspired by Unravel Two, this cooperative platformer aims to create meaningful interactions between players. You and your partner must make use of your personal and shared abilities to make it to the end of each level. But be cautious; as communication is crucial to avoid cancelling out your partner's actions.

Art Assets from Kenney

Background Music from Free Music Archive

Sound Effects from Pixabay
